# Pull Requests

When creating a pull request, please prefix one of the following items, of which you believe is the appropriate one:

- ğŸŒŸ [Feature]: A new feature has been added
- ğŸ”„ [Refactor]: Enhancing/Optimizing code, making it more readable and/or maintainable
- ğŸ”§ [Fix]: Fixed an issue with a certain function
- ğŸ“š [Documentation]: Improvements or additions to documentation
- ğŸ¨ [SCSS]: Addition or improvements to the SCSS

**Prefixing is not mandatory, but is appreciated!**
